titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the J. L. Millspaugh papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Battle Creek and Chelsea, Michigan, businessman, dealer of the Hollier automobile for western Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence from C. J. McCarty concerning debt owed by McCarty, a Muskegon, Michigan, dealer, with comments on the Hollier automobile and Millspaugh's dealership.
